message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.CY 

This paper discusses a new attack on Ethereum to steal cryptocurrency, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The attack involves exploiting unprotected JSON-RPC endpoints on Ethereum nodes, which relates to network security (cs.NI) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also involves designing and implementing a honeypot to capture real attacks, which relates to software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the profits of attackers, which relates to cybercrime (cs.CY).
